org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode

Class LinearAutoGyroOpMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpMode
      • com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
        • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearGyroOpMode
          • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearAutoGyroOpMode

  • public abstract class LinearAutoGyroOpMode
extends org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearGyroOpMode
    LinearAutoGyroOpMode This abstract class extends LinearGyroOpMode and implements the methods for our autonomous programs. Each autonomous opmode will be a subclass of this one and call a method which has the actual movement

    The methods allow you to specify your Alliance color to decide directions

    Author:
    team14821 Cactus Intelligence Agency

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void autoGetFirstBlock(org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearGyroOpMode.Alliance color)
      Go get the first block and take it across the line, the park on line and stop This isn't used anymore since we can get two skystones
      void autoMoveFoundation(org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearGyroOpMode.Alliance color)
      Move the foundation into the build area (the corner) Start with the fangs against the wall Drive forward, turn around, then back into the foundation Grab the foundation with our fangs, then drive forward Turn toward the line which will turn the foundation into the corner Let go and then drive torward the line
      void autoParkOnLineAtBridge(org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearGyroOpMode.Alliance color)
      Drive forward to the bridge, turn, and park on line Starting on the FOUNDATION side, so BLUE turns RIGHT (-1) RED turns LEFT (+1)
      void autoTwoSkystones(org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearGyroOpMode.Alliance color)
      Autonomous to get both skystones.
      void scoot(LinearAutoGyroOpMode.Direction direction)
      Scoot to the left or right the distance of 1 block Back up so we don't bump into the block in front of us Turn (left or right) 90 degrees Drive forward the distance of 1 block Turn back to the original heading Drive forward, stopping if we get too close to a block (distance sensor)
      void scootAngle(LinearAutoGyroOpMode.Direction direction, double angle)
      Scoot to the left or right the distance of 1 block but at any angle not just 90 degrees Back up so we don't bump into the block in front of us, with extra distance depending on our angle Turn (left or right) by angle degrees Drive forward the hypotenuse of our triangle dH Turn back to the original heading Drive forward, stopping if we get too close to a block (distance sensor)

    • Method Detail

      • scootAngle

        public void scootAngle(LinearAutoGyroOpMode.Direction direction,
                       double angle)
        Scoot to the left or right the distance of 1 block but at any angle not just 90 degrees Back up so we don't bump into the block in front of us, with extra distance depending on our angle Turn (left or right) by angle degrees Drive forward the hypotenuse of our triangle dH Turn back to the original heading Drive forward, stopping if we get too close to a block (distance sensor)
        Parameters:
        direction - Which direction we should scoot

      • scoot

        public void scoot(LinearAutoGyroOpMode.Direction direction)
        Scoot to the left or right the distance of 1 block Back up so we don't bump into the block in front of us Turn (left or right) 90 degrees Drive forward the distance of 1 block Turn back to the original heading Drive forward, stopping if we get too close to a block (distance sensor)
        Parameters:
        direction - Which direction we are scooting, LEFT or RIGHT

      • autoTwoSkystones

        public void autoTwoSkystones(org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearGyroOpMode.Alliance color)
        Autonomous to get both skystones. Start with robot aimed at the first block that's farthest from the wall (position 0). Drive close to the block fast, then drive slower until we're close to it. Check the color - if it's not a skystone then scoot to the left or right and check again If we get to the third block and don't recognize a skystone, just pick it up and continue Back up, turn (left or right) and drive fast to the other side, then drop the block Back all the way to the position of th next skystone If the first skystone was in position 2, then just go back to position 4 since we can't pick up a block that's against the wall anyhow After delivering the second block, just back up to the line
        Parameters:
        color - Which alliance color we are, determines the direction for scooting and turning to put the block on the other side

      • autoGetFirstBlock

        public void autoGetFirstBlock(org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearGyroOpMode.Alliance color)
        Go get the first block and take it across the line, the park on line and stop This isn't used anymore since we can get two skystones
        Parameters:
        color - our Alliance color

      • autoParkOnLineAtBridge

        public void autoParkOnLineAtBridge(org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearGyroOpMode.Alliance color)
        Drive forward to the bridge, turn, and park on line Starting on the FOUNDATION side, so BLUE turns RIGHT (-1) RED turns LEFT (+1)
        Parameters:
        color - our Alliance color

      • autoMoveFoundation

        public void autoMoveFoundation(org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.LinearGyroOpMode.Alliance color)
        Move the foundation into the build area (the corner) Start with the fangs against the wall Drive forward, turn around, then back into the foundation Grab the foundation with our fangs, then drive forward Turn toward the line which will turn the foundation into the corner Let go and then drive torward the line
        Parameters:
        color - Which color our Alliance is
